name: Japan Tenki
author: Kunitoshi Hoshino

sections.description:
This plugin can display a weather forecast and expected temperature of today, tomorrow, the day after tomorrow of the Japan 142 areas.
Only Japanese supports it now.
In future versions, it is going to support the translation files.

Functions

  1. This plugin displays a weather forecast and expected temperature of today, tomorrow, the day after tomorrow of the Japan 142 areas.
  2. You can be flexible in the short code.

Arbitrary section

My name is Kunitoshi Hoshino.
I am Japanese.
This plugin, created a portal site when the Japanese throughout the country, it became necessary that I made.
And in general it was released as a plugin.
I’m not good at English, so, there may be mistakes in English.
The opportunity to publish a new WordPress plugin that, I would like to learn English.
Thanks!
“WordPress Community” is my blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Japan Tenki directory to the plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You write a short code and can display it.
sections.faq:
Where do you bring information from?

This plugin gets information from “Weather Hacks – livedoor” .
Therefore, the Terms of Use look at “Q&A – Weather Hacks – livedoor” .

What is the supporting language?

Only Japanese supports it now.
In future versions, it is going to support the translation files.

  • October 11, 2011
  • I was able to use the short cord in widget areas.

1.0

  • October 10, 2011
  • Public release.
  • Initial release.

screenshots.caption: This plugin can display a weather forecast and expected temperature of today, tomorrow, the day after tomorrow of the Japan 142 areas.
You understand a number to appoint 142 areas of Japan from a management screen.
